entities.name: mum
entities.description: Harry's mother, mentioned as someone who will be pleased with Hermione's prefect status.

entities.name: nimbus
entities.description: A type of broomstick that is expensive and out of Mum's budget.

entities.name: cleansweep
entities.description: A new type of broomstick that is mentioned as a more affordable alternative to the Nimbus.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is being praised by Hermione for becoming a prefect.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who has just become a prefect and is seeking to tell her parents about it.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, which Hermione asks to borrow in order to deliver the news to her parents.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: The wife of Arthur Weasley and a kind person who has laid out clean robes for Harry.

entities.name: harry's mum and dad
entities.description: Hermione's parents, who will be pleased with her prefect status.

relationships.description: Hermione praises Harry for becoming a prefect.
Hermione asks to borrow Hedwig in order to deliver the news to her parents.
Harry prefers the Cleansweep over the Nimbus.
Hermione wants to tell her parents about becoming a prefect.
